Text: Thanks Sailo... NO thanks to the tracker - stuffed up again...
converted with convertXtoDVD? the audio bit rate looks like you converted it with Convert X to DVD, if you did im sure it came out great, ill check it out thank you..

many thanx for the upload mate 

nice quality as well 

keep them coming like this  :)

Is the English sub also custom?
I'm just wondering since Swedish subs ALWAYS, REGARDLESS SUX (Doesn't matter if they're "the real deal" or custom fucked up)...

The grammar always suck, no matter what, also they toss the words around like if it were free booze to alcoholics on a sale-day...

Well, after a quick look it doesn't appear like it's custom English, but then again, how custom can that sub be, really?

Had another version, titled Swesub.Custom where the English sub were buttfucked every now and then. Words like "Cots" were spelled "Cuts" and guess if that's retarded when that black guy says "I set up more cots in the cellar".

It was annoying the hell out of me, and thankfully this movies English sub were ok, but the Swedish? Pfffth... Shit...
That same quote from the movie. Hah. What a joke. That fuck-head who translated it can go fuck a goat and quit dividing words (Swedish: Särskrivning; Meaning splitting words that are meant to stay together).

In swedish; För er som översätter; Kan ni inte, ska ni fan inte. Lär er grammatik först och främst, sedan kan ni ge fan i att särskriva och sluta kasta om ord! Språken i filmerna ska översättas, inte anpassas till vårt språk. Det är en viss skillnad!

Ser ni inte skillnaden, låt då någon annan göra det istället!

Jag var tvungen, samma citat jag kommenterade;
"Vi kan ha radio kontakt så jag kan hålla dig, uppdaterad"

Fy fan vad efterblivet!!!
GET A FUCKING CLUE YOU NIT!
